channel.title: Can't complete the local docker setup - Yarn steps complain about missing @redash/viz
channel.description:
Hi, is anyone able to complete the current developer setup steps with the Docker image on their local with WSL? These instructions here:
At the `yarn --frozen-lockfile` step I get an error "No registered package found called "@redash/viz" and it exits.
Thanks!
